src:
Caffeine is on scene at the Los Angeles Coffee Festival
07 Nov 2019, 00:49 by Lori Corbin
LOS ANGELES (KABC) -- Los Angeles Coffee Festivall founder Jeffrey Young says last year 5,000 people attended the event and he's looking for an even bigger crowd to enjoy the brewing event held at the Magic Box, The Reef in downtown L.A.Find out more in the story above.
